name: Flower Defender (Brent Jones - Antares Games)
description:
Precious life-giving flowers are in danger. Protecting them from evil monsters! Use your magic ability to fend off foes and your watering pail to grow the flowers. 

Game is played in quick waves.

CONTROLS
  • A&D - Move
  • Space - Jump
  • H - Normal Attack
  • J - Special Attack
  • K - Water
OTHER

This is a game I completed in about 3 weeks. If the reception is positive I plan on making it into a full game - to be released on either PC and/or mobile.

Full Game Mechanics To Look Forward To

  • More stages and waves
  • Varying stage types (focus on defeating enemies, focus on platforming, etc.)
  • More enemy types
  • More weapons and attacks
  • Progression system (player stat increases, weapon stat increases, etc.)
  • Bosses
  • Light/Shadow mechanic. If a plant is in a shadow it won't grow. Player will need to pick up and move it to where the light is.
